statements: SELECT * FROM inventory_levels WHERE clinic_id = 1;
SELECT medicine_name, quantity FROM inventory_levels WHERE expiration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, medicine_name, quantity FROM inventory_levels ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory_levels WHERE expiration_date < '2022-12-31' AND quantity > 50;
SELECT clinic_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM inventory_levels GROUP BY clinic_id;
SELECT * FROM inventory_levels WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY expiration_date DESC
SELECT medicine_name, quantity FROM inventory_levels WHERE clinic_id = 1 ORDER BY medicine_name ASC;
SELECT id, medicine_name, quantity, expiration_date FROM inventory_levels WHERE clinic_id = 2 AND quantity BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY id;
SELECT * FROM inventory_levels WHERE EXTRACT(MONTH FROM expiration_date) = 12;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_items, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM inventory_levels WHERE clinic_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM clinics_inventory WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT clinic_name, medicine_name, quantity FROM clinics_inventory WHERE clinic_id = 1;
SELECT medicine_name, stock_location, quantity_in_stock FROM medicine_stock WHERE expiration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT clinic_id, clinic_name, medicine_name, quantity FROM clinics_inventory ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT clinic_name, COUNT(*) AS total_medicines FROM clinics_inventory GROUP BY clinic_name;
SELECT * FROM clinics_inventory WHERE quantity > 50 ORDER BY clinic_name DESC
SELECT clinic_name, medicine_name, quantity FROM clinics_inventory WHERE clinic_id = 3
SELECT medicine_name, quantity_in_stock FROM medicine_stock WHERE stock_location = 'Warehouse' ORDER BY expiration_date ASC
SELECT clinic_name, medicine_name, c.quantity, s.quantity_in_stock FROM clinics_inventory c JOIN medicine_stock s ON c.medicine_id = s.medicine_id

SELECT c.clinic_name, s.stock_location, SUM(c.quantity) AS total_quantity FROM clinics_inventory c JOIN medicine_stock s ON c.medicine_id = s.medicine_id GROUP BY clinic_name, stock_location HAVING total_quantity >= 100
SELECT * FROM medications;
SELECT name, quantity FROM medications WHERE quantity > 50;
SELECT name, expiration_date FROM medications ORDER BY expiration_date ASC;
SELECT clinics.name, inventory.quantity FROM inventory JOIN clinics ON inventory.clinic_id = clinics.clinic_id;
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM clinics;
SELECT name, quantity FROM medications WHERE expiration_date > '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM clinics WHERE capacity > 50 ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT clinics.name, inventory.quantity FROM clinics JOIN inventory ON clinics.clinic_id = inventory.clinic_id WHERE inventory.quantity < 10;

SELECT medications.name, inventory.quantity, clinics.name AS clinic_name FROM medications JOIN inventory ON medications.id = inventory.medication_id JOIN clinics ON clinics.clinic_id = inventory.clinic_id ORDER BY medications.name, clinic_name;
SELECT * FROM medications JOIN inventory ON medications.id = inventory.medication_id WHERE medications.quantity > 100 AND inventory.quantity <= 20;
SELECT * FROM Medicines;
SELECT clinic_name, location FROM Clinics;
SELECT medicine_name, quantity, expiry_date FROM Medicines WHERE quantity > 50;
SELECT clinic_name, medicine_name, quantity FROM Clinics JOIN Inventory ON Clinics.clinic_id = Inventory.clinic_id JOIN Medicines ON Inventory.medicine_id = Medicines.medicine_id;
SELECT clinic_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM Clinics JOIN Inventory ON Clinics.clinic_id = Inventory.clinic_id GROUP BY clinic_name;
SELECT * FROM Medicines;
SELECT clinic_name, location FROM Clinics WHERE clinic_id = 1;

SELECT m.medicine_name, t.quantity, c.location FROM Medicines m JOIN Inventory i ON m.medicine_id = i.medicine_id JOIN Clinics c ON i.clinic_id = c.clinic_id JOIN Transactions t ON i.clinic_id = t.clinic_id AND i.medicine_id = t.medicine_id;
SELECT clinic_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM Clinics c JOIN Inventory i ON c.clinic_id = i.clinic_id GROUP BY clinic_name;

SELECT t.transaction_id, m.medicine_name, c.clinic_name, t.quantity, t.transaction_date FROM Transactions t JOIN Medicines m ON t.medicine_id = m.medicine_id JOIN Clinics c ON t.clinic_id = c.clinic_id ORDER BY t.transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM clinic
SELECT clinic_name, location FROM clinic
SELECT clinic_id, clinic_name, contact_number FROM clinic WHERE location='New York'
SELECT * FROM medicine ORDER BY expiry_date DESC
SELECT medicine_name, quantity FROM medicine WHERE quantity > 100
SELECT * FROM clinic WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT clinic_name, location FROM clinic WHERE contact_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT clinic_name, location, contact_number FROM clinic WHERE clinic_id > 10 ORDER BY clinic_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM medicine WHERE quantity < 50 AND expiry_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT medicine_name, quantity FROM medicine WHERE quantity BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY quantity ASC;
